channel.title: How do you mkae your own rank for a 508 server
channel.description: I'm wondering how do you get a message next to your name when you talk for 508. because 508 only has 2 ranks. If you konw what file and what to do please tell me. i dont get how to get your rights 3 and still have the gold crown.

item.title: How do you mkae your own rank for a 508 server
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

i’ve been having the same problem, but i noticed that when you look at the playerRights = 2 thing and the playerRights = 3 that it has another code under it. (the playerRights = 2 has it, not the playerRights = 3) I messed around with it and got it, can’t remember how now. sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you mkae your own rank for a 508 server
